Tap the phone icon to open the phone application.
Open the Contacts app, displaying the contact information for "Arthur Wang".
Click the pencil icon to edit the contact information for "Arthur Wang".
Click the "Mobile" label dropdown menu to select a different label for the phone number.
Click the 'Mobile' option from the dropdown menu.
Click the phone number field "+1 968-086-5522" to edit the contact's phone number.
Enter '1234567890' into the phone number field.
Click the three dots icon in the upper right corner to access additional options.
